name: 楊韻華
objective:
本課主旨在針對托福口說測驗設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟托福口說測驗
This course focuses on test taking skills And strategies for TOEFL iBT speaking and writing. It is designed for students who wish to study abroad, including advanced graduate studies and exchange programs. English proficiency level measured at CEFR B1 level is a prerequisite for enrollment.
schedule:
W1: Orientation 
W2-18 (biweekly): Skills, strategies and practice
scorePolicy:
Attendance 20%
Practice 40%
Mock tests 40%
Changes will be made as the class proceeds at the professor’s discretion.
